Unwavering Soul Calculator

Info:
To see your DPS, input your stats below. Everything is ordered by low reset to high reset, and the items type (Weapon, Event Weapon , Miscellaneous, Event Miscellaneous, and Skills). Also note that some of the special items are purely calculated on very few points of damage. Meaning it won't be perfect.
